column4: i have a question for you guys, i have a machine with ubuntu + windows, windows was the first os i had on the system.. i want to change the windows partition (from xp home, to vista) can i do this without messing up the dual boot or am i gonna run into trouble...
i dont know how Vista does its installing. It might wanna be greedy and reformat the HDD. But i'm quite sure it'll let you just isntall/upgrade your windows partition
the boot loader sits on the MBR
